nodes.text: A Chiss male held the title of Aristocra in the Chiss Ascendancy's Irizi family. The Aristocra served as a representative for Cadet Irizi'ar'alani when she became involved in a hearing at the Taharim Academy for the supposed cheating of Cadet Mitth'raw'nuru in a simulation. Cadet Ziara, unsure of the legitimacy of Thrawn's charges, contacted Supreme General Ba'kif, who had Thrawn re-enact the simulation with real patrol ships, proving his innocence.
